snippet.title: Bang Bang Barrage | Quirky Multiplayer Shooter Game | Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist and join the playtest on Steam now

Bang Bang Barrage is an insanely addictive sea-themed roguelite multiplayer shooter gamer where you play as an adorable, gun-wielding bean battling to fend off Cthulhu’s minions. Master a unique recoil-based movement system where simple gunplay becomes a dance of strategy. Survive wave after wave of enemies, and uncover endless combinations of upgrades and buffs/debuffs. Team up with friends or go solo, and blast your way to victory!

Join our communities:
Twitter: https://x.com/bangbangbarrage
TikTok: https://tiktok.com/@bangbangbarrage

#multiplayer #shootergames #coopgames #partygames #arcadegames #roguelite #topdownshooter #arenashooter
